mil7.7.2:1.1: “Bhante nagasena, ‘thanassitadarakassa ekam angam gahetabban’ti yam vadesi, katamam tam ekam angam gahetabban”ti?
mil7.7.2:1.2: “Yatha, maharaja, thanassitadarako sadatthe laggati, khiratthiko rodati;
mil7.7.2:1.3: evameva kho, maharaja, yogina yogavacarena sadatthe laggitabbam, sabbattha dhammananena bhavitabbam, uddese paripucchaya sammappayoge paviveke garusamvase kalyanamittasevane.
mil7.7.2:1.4: Idam, maharaja, thanassitadarakassa ekam angam gahetabbam.
mil7.7.2:1.5: Bhasitampetam, maharaja, bhagavata devatidevena dighanikayavare parinibbanasuttante—
mil7.7.2:2.1: ‘Ingha tumhe, ananda, saratthe ghatatha, saratthe anuyunjatha, saratthe appamatta atapino pahitatta viharatha’”ti.
